column3: Location, decor, friendly, room amazing, great breakfast. Would definitely stay here again.

The location was very close to the city center. The hotel breakfast was excellent. The room was clean and met all expectations. Staff was very pleasant and helped with directions, restaurant recommendations, etc.
Staff were very pleasant and helpful.  Location couldn't be better. We had a very enjoyable stay and would recommend this hotel to anyone.
